{"id":850485697,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1669526254,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"532 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/850485697/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array","memory":"19.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int removeDuplicates(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int ans = 0;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        unordered_map<int,bool> vis;\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); ) {\n            if(!vis[nums[i]]) {\n                vis[nums[i]] = true;\n                ans++;\n                i++;\n            }\n\n            else {\n                nums.erase(nums.begin() + i);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-duplicates-from-sorted-array","has_notes":false}
